metadata.title: CVE-2020-8597 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
eap.c in pppd in ppp 2.4.2 through 2.4.8 has an rhostname buffer overflowin the eap_request and eap_response functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8597` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ppp - 2.4.7-1+2ubuntu1.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ppp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1+2ubuntu1.16.04.2').
